properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 2:56AM CST until January 29 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City/Pleasant HIll MO
properties.description:
...Light Snow Possible Tuesday Evening through Wednesday
Afternoon...

.Light snow will develop across the area west to east Tuesday
evening through Wednesday afternoon. Highest snow amounts will
be focused across eastern Kansas to central Missouri with peak
activity overnight Tuesday through Wednesday morning. The Tuesday
evening and Wednesday morning commutes may be impacted.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two
inches.

* WHERE...In Kansas, Linn KS County. In Missouri, Pettis,
Cooper, Bates and Henry Counties.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon CST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the Tuesday evening and Wednesday morning
commutes.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY
